thread.section_title: Stoney Creek Wine Press Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Stoney Creek Wine Press | stoneycreekwinepress.com
thread.title: Christina Lugo
thread.title_full: Stoney Creek Wine Press reviewed by Christina Lugo

author: Christina Lugo
title: Christina Lugo
text: I contacted Stonerycreek because I wasn't sure if the product I was ordering would have good clarity, I didn't want to order & be disappointed. Customer service was great, they were very polite & helpful. They were able to look up my order & tell how well my labels would look if printed. I ordered and received my labels when anticipated and was very happy to see they turned out perfectly. Overall very satisfied with my whole experience!
